text: Util contains its own implementation of a URL encoder with a note to replace with the one from the JRE when minimum support level is Java 1.4 or later.
creator: jboynes@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 25718
Patch to switch to using URLEncoder
creator: jboynes@apache.org
bayard@apache.org
text:
svn ci -m "Upgraded to the JVM included version of URLEncoder from the Util.URLEncode method. Removing said method. Supplid by Jeremy Boynes to #49561" src/main/
